author: davidlt
body:
This resolves: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/21105

Do not use references as those will be to a temporary object.
`BasicTransientTrack` class methods return copies, not references.

Signed-off-by: David Abdurachmanov <David.Abdurachmanov@cern.ch>
title: Fix stack-use-after-scope in V0Producer
